Name: Story of one Night
About the game: Story of One night - first-person adventure game with elements of horror. You have to use ingenuity to escape from the chilling nightmare, simultaneously trying to get to the core of what is happening. Collect pieces of tips and information by finding notes, run away from the mystic pursuer and find a way to trap him. To escape you have to go through many unusual doors and find the right exit. But here on the way to it you will find all the new reasons not to wake up ...
